attributes.additional_details:
Will disabled people get a job before their benefits are ripped away from them or will they again be left high and dry by a very uncaring Labour government.

I agree lots of disabled people would love a job but getting everything in place will be a logistical nightmare.
Can you assure they will go from full benefits to full wages., will you support them for the time needed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may also wish to sign these petitions which call for the introduction of a wealth tax to be reviewed, and for a 2% wealth tax on assets over £10m to be introduced.
